#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define MAX 100005

char a[MAX];
int dp[MAX];

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",&a);

        int len = strlen(a);
        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));

        int count = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
            if(a[i]=='1')
            count++;

        if(a[0]=='0')
            dp[0] = 1;
        else
            dp[0] = -1;

        for(int i=1;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]=='0')
                dp[i] = max(dp[i-1]+1,+1);
            else
                dp[i] = max(dp[i-1]-1,-1);
        }

        int M = INT_MIN;

        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
            M = max(M,dp[i]);

        printf("%d\n",M + count);

    }
    return 0;
}
